data.name: Throttle
data.xml_template:
<route  id="{{source}}">
    <from uri="direct:{{source}}"/>
    {{applyUnmarshal output_format output_format_options}} 
    <onException>
        <exception>
            org.apache.camel.processor.ThrottlerRejectedExecutionException
        </exception>
        <handled>
            <constant>
                {{rejectExecution}}
            </constant>
        </handled>
        {{generateDestination handles.[1].to}}
    </onException>
    <throttle timePeriodMillis="{{timePeriodMillis}}" rejectExecution="{{rejectExecution}}">
        <simple>{{numberOfRequests}}</simple>
    </throttle>
    {{applyMarshal output_format output_format_options}}
    {{generateDestination handles.[0].to}}
</route>
